title: T-Mobile delaying Sprint 3G network shutdown as it migrates legacy customers to 5G [U]
content:
According to The T-Mo Report, T-Mobile is delaying its shutdown date for Sprint’s 3G network again. Originally scheduled for March 31, the new date is May 31. If true, this wouldn’t be the first delay. The carrier had planned to phase out the network in January but announced it would extend to the end of March due to issues with “partners.”

more…

The post T-Mobile delaying Sprint 3G network shutdown as it migrates legacy customers to 5G [U] appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: According to The T-Mo Report, T-Mobile is delaying its shutdown date for Sprint’s 3G network again until May 31.
